Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled value and excellence. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, we believe it is worth more than $8000. Considering this, my offer to you is $12000 for the product. I trust that this price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to experience something truly exceptional. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in quality. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
